And as he <S%G4198>journeyed,<s%> he <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> <S%G1154>Damascus:<s%> and <S%G1810>suddenly<s%> there <S%G4015>shined<s%> <S%G4015>round<s%> <S%G4015>about<s%> him a <S%G5457>light<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven:<s%>
